siyalu palath sabha mathiwarana ekama dinayaka pawathwima athulu 20 wana wyawastha sanshodhanaya sammatha kirima udesa parlimenthuwe thunen deke chandayak pamanak pramanawath nowana bawath ee sandaha janamathawicharanayakin janatha anumathiya labagatha yuthu bawath shreshtadhikaranaya nigamanaya kirimath samaga, 20 wana sanshodhanaya athhala aanduwata, ee wenuwata palath sabha mathiwarana (sanshodhana) panatha sammatha kirimata thibu hadisiya wisin, ese karaka sabha awasthawe wishala kotasak aluthin ek karanu labima, nithiye aadhipathyayatada kala balapamak lesa salakiya hakiya.

irana nawika hamudawata ayath dawanthama yuda naukawa wana "karg" nam naukawa, hadisi ginnak hataganimen anathuruwa muhude gili thibenawa.mema nerukawa gili aththe ooman bokka asaladi bawayi wides madhya wartha kale.irana madhya wartha anuwa eeye (01) paswaruwe karg nam mema naukawa jask waraya asala puhunu meheyumaka nirathawa sitiyadiyi anathurata pathwa aththe.ginna mada pawathwimata gini niwana bhatayin kopamana uthsaha daruwath eya sarthaka wi naha.paya 20ka meheyum adala wimen anathuruwa ada udasana mema dawantha naukawa homus samudra sandhiya aasannaye gili thibenawa.ginna aarambha wu ayuru thawamath anawaranaya wi nomathi athara, ginna hataganna awasthawe naukawe karya mandalaya saha sisun 400 k pamana siti bawa sandahan.irana madhya sandahan karanne nawiyan 20 denekuta pilissum thuwala athi wu namuth kisiwekuta barapathala thuwala siduwa nomathi bawayi.kese wethath, gini ganimata lakwu naukawe chayarupa me wana witath samaja madhya thula sancharanaya wemin pawathinawa.karg, iranaya sathu dawanthama naukawa wana athara, meya iranayata siduwu dawanthama wyasanaya bawayi delimel sandahan karanne.ginna hatagath naukawa thula adhiwegi misayila praharaka yathra hathak pamana thibu bawath sandahan.
